thoughts: Wishes they could visit r_c in StarClan
Was given a prophecy by r_c
Was sent an omen by r_c
Is dreaming about r_c who gives them a message
Saw r_c in a dream, warning them about... something
Is asking for guidance from r_c
Is wondering desperately why r_c wasn't there when they needed them
Is sure that they saw r_c appear in the forest today... why?
Wishes they could visit r_c in Dark Forest
Thought they heard a low rumbling behind them, but nothing was there
Recieved an ominous and dark message from r_c
Has been hearing the voices of Dark Forest cats...
Debates whether or not to ask r_c for gudiance, knowing where they are
Is sure that they saw r_c appear beside a Clanmate, but why?
